Player History
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/3/1985, off Bert Blyleven (STL)...
Traded from San Diego to New York (M) on 4/25/1985 (Going to SD: LF Kevin Mitchell. Going to NYM: P Donnie Moore, C Terry Kennedy, SS Garry Templeton)...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won World Series with New York (M) in 1986...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/18/1989 to a 2-year deal worth $850,000 per year...
